Package armyc2.c5isr.renderer.utilities

Class ImageInfo

java.lang.Object
armyc2.c5isr.renderer.utilities.ImageInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
SymbolDimensionInfo
public class ImageInfo extends Object implements SymbolDimensionInfo
Object that holds an image of the symbol and all the information needed to place the symbol on the screen.

      public ImageInfo getLightClone()
